alert.note: Alert for Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 8:20PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Litchfield County through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodbury Center, or near Southbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... New Milford, Thomaston, Terryville, Woodbury Center, Oakville, Watertown, Plymouth, Woodbury, Bethlehem, Washington, Roxbury, Bridgewater, Northville, Candlewood Springs, Hotchkissville, Pequabuck, Reynolds Bridge, Hancock, River Road Reserve and Candlewood Trails. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
